properties.title: Community Hub

properties.description: We run a Community group for anybody to attend. We usually have a guest speaker or a Musical Event. We hold these groups on the 2nd Wednesday of every month. They are attended by the D and D team from Southport and Ormskirk Hospital , Elite Wills and Probate , Alzheimer's Society , Dementia Nurses and other people pop into our monthly meetings. We have people supporting these events so that people can come along have a FREE tea or coffee and biscuits enjoy a nice afternoon but can speak to people if they need any information from our supporting stall holders that attend .
properties.title: Community Social Guide

properties.description: Every Monday 9.30am – 12pm you’re welcome to join us at Hope Cafe. The drinks are free, there’s usually some food on the go, and probably a game of dominoes! properties.address: The Life Rooms Southport, Merseyside PR8 1NW
properties.description: The Life Rooms Southport is open Monday to Friday from 9.15am to 4.45pm. We'll be offering free tea and coffee throughout the week, and on Monday and Thursday we'll be offering free soup between 10.30am to 3.00pm. Visitors can sign up to free courses and social activities, and get practical advice from a Pathways Advisor who can point them in the right direction for help with social issues like housing, debt, finances, education, and more.
properties.title: The Life Rooms Southport

properties.description: The space is open to all for chat complimentary tea coffee and biscuits
properties.title: Warm and Snug

properties.address: The Station Masters House 2 Liverpool Road, Birkdale Southport, Merseyside PR8 4AR
properties.description: Everyone is welcome to join us at the Station Master's House on the first floor of our library every Thursday between 10 and 4 pm from October 2023 until then end of March 2024. We have a warm welcoming space with access to all through a fully accessible lift. Each Thursday we put on different events for example, quizzes, board games, newspapers and magazines with hot refreshments and snacks. We invite local partners to join us to provide practical advise or potential support (dependent on the topic). We also have wifi and free use of six computers and volunteers to help. Last year strangers became friends and we hope very much that this year we will make even more friends. Everyone is very very welcome.
properties.title: Warm Spaces
